footer.slogan: Your local supermarket in Tlemcen, now online with smart features.

hero.slide1_heading: Fresh Groceries Delivered to Your Door
hero.slide1_subheading: Enjoy the best local produce, vegetables, and more, all handpicked for you.
hero.slide2_subheading: Discover our weekly offers on a wide range of products and save big.
hero.slide3_subheading: Let our AI help you find exactly what you need and create personalized shopping lists.

products.title: All Products
products.subtitle: Browse our wide selection of fresh products and daily essentials.

about.title: About Tlemcen Smart Supermarket
about.subtitle: Bringing freshness and convenience to our community.
about.p1: At Tlemcen Smart Supermarket, we're more than just a grocery store. We are a part of the Tlemcen community, committed to providing the finest fresh produce, local meats, and everyday essentials to our valued customers.
about.p2: Our journey began with a simple vision: to make grocery shopping easier, smarter, and more accessible for everyone in our beloved city. We integrate technology to enhance your shopping experience, from AI-powered recommendations to a seamless checkout process.
about.p3: We pride ourselves on supporting local farmers and producers, ensuring that you get the best our region has to offer while supporting the local economy. Thank you for being a part of our story.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Have a question or feedback? We'd love to hear from you.

legal.p1_text: We collect information you provide directly to us. For example, we collect information when you create an account, participate in any interactive features of our services, fill out a form, request customer support, or otherwise communicate with us.
legal.p2_text: We may use the information we collect about you for various purposes, including to:
legal.p2_l1: Provide, maintain, and improve our services;
legal.p2_l2: Process transactions and send you related information, including confirmations and invoices;
legal.p2_l3: Send you technical notices, updates, security alerts, and support and administrative messages.
legal.p3_text: We may share the information we collect about you as described in this Privacy Policy or as described at the time of information collection or sharing.
legal.p4_text: We take reasonable measures to help protect information about you from loss, theft, misuse, and unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, and destruction.
legal.p5_text: We may change this Privacy Policy from time to time. If we make changes, we will notify you by revising the date at the top of the policy and, in some cases, we may provide you with additional notice.
legal.contact_text: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
legal.t1_text: By accessing or using our Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of the terms, then you may not access the Service.
legal.t2_text: When you create an account with us, you must provide us with information that is accurate, complete, and current at all times. Failure to do so constitutes a breach of the Terms, which may result in immediate termination of your account on our Service.
legal.t3_text: The Service and its original content, features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of Tlemcen Smart Supermarket and its licensors.
legal.t4_text: We may terminate or suspend access to our Service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms.
legal.t5_text: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of Algeria, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
